questions_1.question: Identify the correct statements with respect to Eicas Primary And Secondary Pages.
Options: The EICAS Primary and Secondary pages on the flight deck display messages during the start cycle.
The EICAS Secondary page is located to the left of the standby attitude indicator and below the standby alt/indicated airspeed indicator.
The EICAS Primary page is located to the left of the standby attitude indicator and the standby alt/indicated airspeed indicator.
The EICAS Secondary page is located to the right of the standby attitude indicator and the standby alt/indicated airspeed indicator.
questions_1.correctFeedback:
That's Correct!

You have chosen the correct option.
questions_1.InCorrectFeedback:
That's Incorrect!

You have chosen the wrong option. The valid answer is "The EICAS Primary and Secondary pages on the flight deck display messages during the start cycle, The EICAS Primary page is located to the left of the standby attitude indicator and the standby alt/indicated airspeed indicator, The EICAS Secondary page is located to the right of the standby attitude indicator and the standby alt/indicated airspeed indicator."
